          <title>
            <string language="hu">Attila kardja,vagyis Nagy Károly szablyája.</string>
            <string language="en">Attila's sword, i.e. Charlemagne's sabre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klinge Attilas, d.h. SABRE Karls der Große</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'épée d'Attila, c.-à-d. sabre de Charlemagne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Espada de Attila, isto é sabre de Charlemagne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spada del Attila, cioè Sabre del Charlemagne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ξίφος Attila, δηλ. Charlemagne sabre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Espada de Attila, es decir SABRE de Charlemagne</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Palettacsokrokkal és indafonattal gazdagon díszített arany markolat.</string>
            <string language="en">Gilded grasp richly decorated with palette rosettes and sarmentum plaitings</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ötvösség,  honfoglalás kor,  palmetta,  szablya,  Attila,  kard,  </string>
            <string language="en">goldsmith's art, Hungarian settlement era, palmette, sabre, Attila, sword</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vergoldete Reichweite reich verziert mit Palette 
Rosetten und sarmentum plaitings</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Prise dorée richement décorée des rosettes de 
palette et des plaitings de sarmentum</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aperto gilded decorado rica com rosettes do 
palette e plaitings do sarmentum</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Stretta gilded pienamente decorata con le rosette
della gamma di colori ed i plaitings di sarmentum</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχρυσωμένος έλεγχος που διακοσμείται πλουσιοπάροχα 
με τις ροζέτες παλετών και τα πλεξίματα sarmentum</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Asimiento dorado adornado rico con los rosetones 
de la gama de colores y los plaitings del sarmentum</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kunst des Goldschmieds, ungarische Regelung Ära,
